scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn && npx tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && mkdir dist/public && cp -r src/public dist
scripts.migrate:latest: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs"  yarn knex migrate:latest --knexfile ./src/db/knexfile.ts --env local
scripts.migrate:rollback: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs"  yarn knex migrate:rollback --knexfile ./src/db/knexfile.ts --env local
scripts.migrate:make: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs" yarn knex migrate:make $1 --knexfile ./src/db/knexfile.ts --env local
scripts.migrate:up: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs" yarn knex migrate:up --knexfile ./src/db/knexfile.ts --env local
scripts.migrate:down: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs" yarn knex migrate:down $1 --knexfile ./src/db/knexfile.ts --env local
scripts.migrate:app:up: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs" yarn knex migrate:up --knexfile ./dist/db/knexfile.js --env development
scripts.migrate:app:down: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs" yarn knex migrate:down $1 --knexfile ./dist/db/knexfile.js --env development
scripts.migrate:app:rollback: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import=./register.mjs" yarn knex migrate:rollback --knexfile ./dist/db/knexfile.js --env development
